name: M∀LICE CODE GWC-06
desc: You can activate this card the turn it was Set, by banishing 1 face-up "M∀LICE" monster you control. Special Summon 1 "M∀LICE" monster from your GY or banishment, then, if you control a "M∀LICE" Link Monster, you can gain LP equal to the Summoned monster's original ATK. You can only activate 1 "M∀LICE GWC-06" per turn.
